claim: Brazil is the smallest country in South America.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Uruguay is also the smallest country ever to win any World Cup medals ; only five nations with a currently smaller population than Uruguay 's have ever participated in any World Cup : Northern Ireland  (  three times  )  , Slovenia  (  twice  )  , Wales , Jamaica and Trinidad and Tobago .
